summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the permit granted to the Theta Chi Fraternity, Inc. by Ordinance 105225 to maintain and operate a pedestrian skybridge over and across the alley east of 16th Avenue Northeast, south of Northeast 47th Street, amending Section 8 thereof to establish an annual fee in accordance with the fee schedule adopted by the Board of Public Works in February 1985, and providing for acceptance of the amendment.
